title: How to Draw an Embarrassed Face

steps.headline: Draw a rectangle that will act as a jaw from inside the circle protruding downwards.
Draw 2 ovals for the ears at each side of the rectangle.
steps.description: Add a triangle below the rectangle for the chin.

steps.headline: Find the center line.
steps.description: Draw a line across the top of the ears.

steps.headline: Draw 2 more guidelines.
steps.description: 1 should be across the middle of the ears and the other below them.

steps.headline: Use your guidelines to draw the eye sockets by drawing 2 circles between the top and the second lines.
steps.description: The nose tip is on the third line. The shape of the nose can be determined by drawing a diamond.

steps.headline: Draw the details.
steps.description: Since this is an embarrassed face, draw the eyes small, almost line-like. Draw 2 high diagonal lines going away from the nose.

steps.headline: Draw the details for the nose.
steps.description: First, draw the desired size of nostrils using triangles. Then, draw curved lines to show the nose, as seen in the image.

steps.headline: The mouth should be drawn small and thin almost like a line with a small weak smile.
Ink the drawing then erase the sketch.

text: Draw a big circle.  Draw a rectangle that will act as a jaw from inside the circle protruding downwards.  Draw 2 ovals for the ears at each side of the rectangle. Add a triangle below the rectangle for the chin. Find the center line. Draw a line across the top of the ears. Draw 2 more guidelines. 1 should be across the middle of the ears and the other below them. Use your guidelines to draw the eye sockets by drawing 2 circles between the top and the second lines. The nose tip is on the third line. The shape of the nose can be determined by drawing a diamond. Draw the details. Since this is an embarrassed face, draw the eyes small, almost line-like. Draw 2 high diagonal lines going away from the nose. Draw the details for the nose. First, draw the desired size of nostrils using triangles. Then, draw curved lines to show the nose, as seen in the image. The mouth should be drawn small and thin almost like a line with a small weak smile.  Ink the drawing then erase the sketch.  Color your drawing.
